title: Sport-Tek Men's Spectator Gloves
desc: No need to shed your gloves to use your smartphone or tablet. These colorful touchscreen-friendly gloves have a conductive thread in the thumb forefinger and middle finger of each hand so you can root for your favorite team while staying in touch with other fans. Coordinates with our Spectator Beanie (STC20 sold separately) and Spectator Scarf (STA02 sold separately). 82/15/3 acrylic/poly/other fibers

title: ScorpionEXO SGS MK II Gloves
desc: Premium leather short cuff sport Glovess with carbon fiber hard knuckles

title: Dakine Titan Gore-Tex Glove Men's
desc: 55% Recycled Polyester, 45% Polyester

title: SHOWA 282-02 Waterproof Breathable Insulated Work Glove with Extended Cuff
desc: 50% PU, 50% Acrylic. Water-resistant yet breathable, this thermal insulated glove uses our state-of-the-art TEMRES technology to keep hands warm, dry, and well-protected in cold climates for optimal comfort and performance. The original blue SHOWA 282 revamped for outdoor adventures. Ideal for snow sports, ice climbing, hunting, ice fishing and more

title: Nike mens Sporty
desc: 95% acrylic, 5% spandex/elastane. The warm knitwear is ideal for cold weather. With embroidered swoosh on the back of the hand

title: Hestra Army Leather Heli Ski Glove - Classic 5-Finger Snow Glove for Skiing, Snowboarding and Mountaineering
desc: DESIGNED FOR: The Army Leather Heli Ski was designed for freeriders, professional mountain guides and patrollers, ski instructors and others who place high demands on function, fit and durability. DURABLE FABRIC: Windproof, water-resistant, and breathable HESTRA Triton fabric on backhand with our most durable Army Goat Leather on palm and fingers.

title: Hand Cream - I'm a Delicate F*cking Flower
desc: I'm a delicate fucking flower hand cream is not only snarky, but also a quality hand cream. Made of a super-nourishing blend of shea butter, almond oil and vitamin E.

title: Pop Rocks Popping Candy
desc: Fun candy that pops in your mouth.  .33 ounces of flavored candy.

title: Lower Expectations 8'x10' Gift Bag
desc: This gift bag pairs perfectly with many of the items we carry in our shop!

title: Jellycat Amuseable Birthday Cake
desc: This little pastry is just as sweet as any other birthday cake you've ever met, but it's all concentrated in personality. If it wasn't clear, that's our way of saying DON'T EAT THIS BIRTHDAY CAKE IT'S NOT FOR EATING AND IT WON'T TASTE GOOD. Also, how could you do that to this adorable, smiling friend?

title: I Farted in This Envelope Birthday Card
desc: Yeah, I could write you a nice note, but I really wanted to access all your senses. Take a big sniff for me! And you're welcome. Also happy birthday.

title: Pot Head Birthday Card
desc: Have a friend that loves puns and getting high? Well, this is the perfect card for them. Heck, even better if they love the environment because this card is made completely out of post-consumer recycled paper. This is the birthday card that just keeps on giving!

title: Who's Awesome? You're Awesome! Gum
desc: 8 pieces of cinnamon flavored gum, each reminding you of just how awesome you are!

title: Shakespearean Insult Bandages
desc: Insults with style. Includes 15 bandages and a free surprise all in a tin box.

title: Audubon Birds 1000 pc puzzle
desc: This puzzle depicts an Audubon chart of common birds.

title: Poo-Pourri Dapper Crapper Gift Set
desc: 2 lovely scents of Poo-Pourri to keep your bathroom smelling wonderful even after the biggest, stinkiest of dumps! One smells like lemon, bergamot, and lemongrass. The other smells like eucalyptus and spearmint. Each bottle has enough for 100+ uses.

title: Codenames Game
desc: A highly rated, award winning game! Two rival spymasters know the secret identities of 25 agents. Their teammates know the agents only by their CODENAMES.

title: Super F-ing Awesome Women's Ankle Socks
desc: These socks say it all. 'Super Fucking Awesome'. Fits Women's shoe sizes 5-10.

title: Don't Make Mommy Be A Bitch Gum
desc: Seriously, for both our sakes. And don't you even dare bring up that time I told you that we're in control of our own feelings and actions.

title: Shower/Bath Wine Holder
desc: What could make your hot shower or soothing bath even better?  A nice glass of wine obviously.  But you don't want to hold it the whole time - that's not relaxing. Have the best of both worlds with this shower wine holder!

title: Butter Butter Butter Oven Mitt (sale)
desc: What to add to your recipe / meal to make it awesome???? Butter... yes butter and more butter and then a little more butter!

title: Farter’s Day Card
desc: A fun letterpress card that says 'Happy Father's Day'  or does it say 'Happy Farter's day'??

title: Loudest Farter Champion Trophy Mug
desc: Honestly, I didn't even know there was a competition going on, I just had a really hefty bowl of leftover chili for lunch and the rest is history. A great gift for dad or anyone else that takes joy in a noisy fart.

title: You Might be a Republican but... still the greatest Dad Card
desc: You might be a Republican, but you are still the world's greatest dad! Especially when we're not talking about politics. Yeesh. Blank inside. Includes an envelope.

title: Stunt Planes Stomp Rocket
desc: Explore this new twist on the classic STOMP rockets! These stunt planes will allow for hours of fun play. Designed by aeronautical engineers, the three planes are made to flip and spin in the air. Recommended for Ages 5+

title: Wingman Pro - 8.2'
desc: One random style Flexible silicone flyer. It's soft and flexible and flies over 200 feet.

title: Cabin Fever Game - Ring on a String USA
desc: A fun old fashioned game of ring on a string.  Attach the hook and hardware to a wall and then toss the string and ring and try to land it on the hook.

title: Huckleberry Motor Boat DIY Kit
desc: Make a raft with whatever you have lying around: scrap pieces of wood, an extra tupperware lid, or whatever else! Then attach this motor to your new raft press the button, and watch it go!

title: HugglePod Lite - Blue
desc: The Hugglepod Lite is a hanging chair that makes reading or hanging out (ha ha literally) super fun.  Includes a comfortable inflatable cushion (pump not included). Made of durable tough lightweight nylon.

title: Return Ball - Baseball
desc: No friends? No problem! Next time your buddies all go on family vacations the same week and leave you bored and lonely, you can play catch with yourself! You're even allowed to use it with your friends when they get back.

title: Voli Racket Set w/Flyer
desc: A great new outdoor game! Voli is a game in which you wear a racket-glove and hit a shuttlecock back an forth. Play freestyle, with teams, or any other way you find! Comes with 2 rackets (fits most sizes from child to adult and 1 shuttlecock. Take it anywhere with enough room and get your Voli on!

title: AirFort the Instant Fort
desc: The AirFort is the amazing fort that sets up in seconds and provides hours of fun for the whole family! Set up anywhere instantly with a household fan. Kick it down, watch it pop back to life immediately! TOTY 2020 Toy Of The Year Finalist! Choose from a variety of colours; Beach Ball Blue, Grey Digital Camo, Ocean Blue Camo, Mod Grey, Pink & White, Creamsicle Orange, and the NEW Glow-In-The-Dark Starry Sky Glow! Box fan sold separately (not included)
